Name: ADM 2(WHEN WORLDS COLLIDE)
About the game: Angels,Demons and Men 2(when worlds collide) is a story rich,hack n slash,acdventure rpg.Darkness continues to take over the lands.Explore new locations,master new skills,stand up and fight. EXPLORE VARIOUS UNIQUE CHARACTERS AND THEIR EPIC JOURNEYS Alexander(the royal guard) continues his journey back to the kingdom through the demon maze Kaia(the angel) continues the search for her mentor and old friend Audra(the mage) crosses into hell through a portal to free mia. Cade (the demon king) continues to match his army through the kingdom and slaying everything in his way Lance(the captain of knights) assembles the last men in the kingdom for one last stand against cade
